titles.title: To provide for economic assistance to agricultural producers, and for other purposes.
To provide for economic assistance to agricultural producers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
